name: GMO Survivors
description:
[EDIT] - Experiencing issues with itch

[EDIT1] - Fixed :)

[EDIT2] - Ran into issue where my wireless mouse caused Camera lag (Not Fixed)

[EDIT3] - Changed itch download to a zip folder, working on making a webGL build, thanks everyone who pointed it out!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

LMB - Shoot

INSTRUCTIONS:

Collect SEEDS and fire them into dirt patches to grow PLANTS

Collect PLANTS and fire them anywhere to grow TURRETS to defend yourself

FEATURES CUT FOR TIME:

  • Player HP - ...yeah idk, I'm bad, just close the game when you've had enough lol
  • UI - No words for this either
  • Sound - Can you blame me???
  • Shop System - My Spaghetti code is to blame
  • Clock/High Score - :(
  • Polish/Post Processing
  • Literally anything capable of making this game look good

TIPS

  • There's about 30 seconds at the start of the match before enemies spawn. Use this time to plant seeds, harvest crops, and set up turrets
  • Seeds cannot grow in the grass
  • New seeds cannot be planted on crowded dirt patches
